abstracts.cdata!:
The objectives of Second Export
            Development Project (EDP II) for Tunisia are to improve
            access to export markets and finance, enhance the efficiency
            and performance of trade clearance process (customs
            operations and technical controls). Development objectives
            of the project remain unchanged as are the design and
            implementation arrangements of the project. The closing
            dates of the EDP II will be extended for a period of 12
            months, from March 31, 2011 to March 31, 2012. This will be
            the second extension of the closing date for this project.
            Overall, EDP II has been successful in terms of outcomes as
            envisioned within the framework of the loan agreements. Good
            progress has been achieved towards the project's
            development objectives. Components targets are left
            unchanged for this extension; some are already reached.
